products.name: Basic White T-Shirt
products.alt: Basic white t-shirt made from 100% cotton
products.description: A comfortable and soft basic white t-shirt made from 100% cotton. Perfect for casual wear.

products.name: Skinny Fit Jeans
products.alt: Stylish skinny fit jeans in durable denim
products.description: Stylish skinny fit jeans designed for comfort and a sleek look. Made from durable denim.

products.name: Leather Biker Jacket
products.alt: Black leather biker jacket with zip front
products.description: Classic black leather biker jacket. Features a zip front and zip pockets. Timeless and versatile.

products.name: Wool Blend Sweater
products.alt: Cozy wool blend sweater in relaxed fit
products.description: Cozy wool blend sweater in a relaxed fit. Great for layering in the colder months.

products.name: Casual Hoodie
products.alt: Fleece-lined casual hoodie with drawstring hood
products.description: A soft, fleece-lined hoodie in a regular fit. Features a drawstring hood and a kangaroo pocket.

products.name: High-Waisted Skinny Jeans
products.alt: High-waisted skinny jeans in stretch denim
products.description: High-waisted skinny jeans with a flattering fit. Crafted from stretch denim for all-day comfort.

products.name: Denim Jacket
products.alt: Blue denim jacket with buttoned cuffs and chest pockets
products.description: Classic blue denim jacket with buttoned cuffs and chest pockets. A wardrobe essential for any season.

products.name: Polo Shirt
products.alt: Cotton polo shirt with buttoned collar and short sleeves
products.description: Smart-casual polo shirt made from breathable cotton. Features a buttoned collar and short sleeves.

products.name: V-Neck Wool Sweater
products.alt: V-neck wool sweater, lightweight and soft
products.description: A lightweight V-neck sweater made from soft wool. Perfect for layering over shirts or wearing alone.

products.name: Cargo Pants
products.alt: Relaxed fit cargo pants with multiple pockets
products.description: Utility-inspired cargo pants with multiple pockets. Made from durable cotton with a relaxed fit.

products.name: Baggy Pants
products.alt: Loose fit baggy pants in breathable fabric
products.description: Comfortable baggy pants with a loose fit. Made from lightweight, breathable fabric, perfect for casual and relaxed occasions.

products.name: Bomber Jacket
products.alt: Lightweight bomber jacket with ribbed cuffs and hem
products.description: Lightweight bomber jacket with ribbed cuffs and hem. A modern take on a classic style.
